title: Medieval User Interface - Sound Effects
description: Make your User Interface come to Life with this sounds! :D
longDescription:
Hello Dev!


This pack was created thinking about User Interfaces that need physical sounds, and not digital ones, the vast majority was thinking about medieval sounds but it can be used for different themes.


Altogether there are 157 high quality files that will certainly be useful at some point in your interface.


There are metallic sounds, paper, coins, whooshes, and several others


And it's worth remembering that by investing in this pack you take all that and still help me to continue creating quality sound effects at a nice price for the community!


Check the preview

Check the documentation


Here's the list of folders, each folder has several files inside.


  • Buy
  • Change_Option
  • Change_Tab
  • CheckBox
  • Click_Stone
  • Clothes
  • Drop_Down
  • Equip_Item
  • Equip_Potion
  • Equip_Sword
  • Generic_Click
  • Grab_Paper
  • Hover
  • Move_Item_Book
  • Move_Item_Equipment
  • Move_Item_Gem
  • Sell_Item
  • Shoes
  • Slider
  • Storage_Item
  • Timer
  • Unequip_Item
  • Window
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 157

Number of Audio Cues: 157

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) 44,100

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes/No) No

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes

Documentation: Check the documentation

Important/Additional Notes: The recorder used for the sounds is the H4N pro, and the image is distributed free of charge for commercial use by pixabay.
